html:
Role Voice type Premiere cast,
3 March 1671[8]
Pomone (Pomona), goddess of fruits soprano
Flore (Flora), goddess of flowers, Pomone's sister soprano
Vertumne (Vertumnus), god of Lares, in love with Pomone basse-taille (baritone)
Faune (Faunus), god of villagers, in love with Pomone basse-taille
Dieu des Jardins (God of gardens), in love with Pomone
Juturne, a nymph of Pomone
Venilie, a nymph of Pomone
Beroé, Pomone's nurse
